DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study investigate effect 10 week recreational physical activity program irisin level , progenitor endothelial cell cardiometabolic profile healthy child . Also , investigated correlation marker anthropometric data , body composition , cardiac autonomic balance physical fitness parameter . We evaluate eighty child age 6 14 participate recreational physical activity program 10 week ( Duration : 60 minute ; Intensity : 65 % -85 % heart rate reserve ; Frequency : 4 sessions/week ) . All parameter evaluate approach .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study conduct representative group child age 6 14 identify Youth Healthcare Centre locate near Federal University São Paulo ( São Paulo , SP , Brazil ) . A total 110 child identify study period . However , five individual respiratory problem 12 individual agree participate exclude study . In addition , 13 individual complete anthropometric , metabolic physical fitness assessment post-training period also exclude . Therefore , 80 child ( 32 girl 48 boy ) include study . No child clinical sign musculoskeletal orthopedic disorder prevent perform propose physical fitness test . The Ethics Committee Federal University São Paulo approve study protocol ( Number : 795.262 ) . All parent child sign write informed consent/assent form . Experimental Design : Each child complete experimental protocol period 10 week consist baseline measurement anthropometric data , body composition , irisin level , metabolic physical fitness parameter . All measurement repeat 10-week recreational physical activity program carry within 72 hour last training session . Recreational Physical Activity Program : Participants perform 10 week recreational physical activity program circuit training , consist exercise program flexibility , coordination , strength ( upper low limb ) , aerobic resistance control use Polar S810i monitor ( Polar Electro OY , Finland ; sample rate=100Hz ) dynamic balance improve functional capacity . A total 40 session perform duration ( 60 minute ) , intensity ( 65 % -85 % heart rate reserve ) , frequency ( 4 sessions/week ) . Each session consist three part : Warm-up ( 10 minute ) , physical activity session ( 45 minute ) cool ( 5 minute ) . Moreover , subjective Borg scale perceive exertion apply child control training intensity . Anthropometry : Body weight height measure light clothing without shoe use standard balance beam scale . Waist hip circumference measure use inextensible tape . Waist circumference record level midway lower rib margin iliac crest end normal expiration . . Body Composition : Body composition evaluate use bioelectrical impedance single-frequency hand-to-foot ( ImpediMed DF50 monitor , Impedimed , Australia ) . Children ask avoid physical activity consume liquids 2 hour evaluation prevent error measurement due fluid imbalance . This evaluation perform 5 minute rest supine position , electrodes applied hand , wrist , ankle foot right-hand side body . Body fat calculate prediction equation . Cardiorespiratory Fitness : The 20-meter shuttle run test ( 20MST ) perform estimate cardiorespiratory fitness . The test start 8 km/h increase 0.5 km/h every minute . This test carry plane surface , explain field team member . All child make adaptation 20MST test . The velocity last stage complete child record used calculate VO2max ( ml/kg/min ) accord equation propose Léger et al . Standing Broad Jump : The child stand behind line mark ground . A two foot take-off landing use , swing arm , child jump far possible foot simultaneously . The test item score ( well three attempt ) distance start line land position ( measured centimeter ) . Sit Reach Test : The flexibility evaluate use Wells Bench . For test , child perform movement hand overlap , foot rest bench knee totally extend aid researcher . The result give maximum distance obtain three attempt , respect one-minute interval . Handgrip Strength Test : Grip strength measure hand use digital dynamometer ( Kern & Sohn , Model MAP 80K1S , Germany ) . In test , child seat appropriately size chair , shoulder abduct , elbow 90 degree flexion , wrist neutral position . After , researcher ask child perform great possible force shortest time . The mean three maximum voluntary contraction record hand express Kg . Blood Collection Biochemical Variables : In morning ( 7:00 - 9 : 00hrs ) overnight fast , blood venous sample ( 10 ml ) collect venipuncture forearm vein separate vacutainer tube contain spray-dried K2EDTA anticoagulant gel serum separator . EDTA sample centrifuge within 1 hour blood collection ( 4°C - 1,500 g 15 min ) plasma aliquot irisin measurement store -80°C assay . Automated enzymatic procedure use measure glucose insulin routine method Clinical Laboratory Kidney & Hypertension Hospital . Insulin resistance calculate homeostasis model assessment ( HOMA-IR ) method , accord follow formula : [ glucose ( mg/dl ) /18 x insulin ( mUI/ml ) ] /22.5 . Assessment Irisin : Plasma irisin level determine use commercially available ELISA kit ( MyBioSource , Catalog Number : MBS 706887 , San Diego , CA , USA ) . The intra assay inter assay coefficient variation le 8 % . These assay perform duplicate , remove bias , researcher devise blind analysis technique . Hemodynamic Variables Heart Rate Variability : Blood pressure level measure twice right arm child seat position use automated oscillometric device ( Omron HEM907XL ; Omron Healthcare ; USA ) appropriate cuff size . The blood pressure value average three measurement make 2-min interval . After procedure , child ask lay silently supine position bed minimal body movement maintain spontaneous breathe 10 minute record rest heart rate short-term heart rate variability use Polar S810i monitor ( Polar Electro OY , Finland ; sample rate=100Hz ) . The researcher blind clinical data conduct assessment child . Processing Heart Rate Variability Data : The heart rate variability index calculate previously describe 27 , 28 . Briefly , normal beat beat interval transfer Polar S810i Precision Performance Software infrared interface device . These data process specific previous routine design MatLab ( Math Works , 6.0 version , USA ) automatic selection 5 minute RR small variance . Afterwards , time series last 5 minute analyze Kubios software ( Biosignal Analysis Medical Image Group , University Kuopio , Finland ) . In software , artifact correct moderated filter , time-domain component calculate . The following time-domain index analyze : heart rate ( HR ) , MNN ( average normal RR interval ) , SDNN ( standard deviation RR interval ) , RMSSD ( root mean square successive difference RR interval ) , pNN50 ( percent RR interval difference duration high 50 m ) . The frequency-domain component also evaluate 2 power spectrum . The classical frequency low frequency ( LF= 0.041-0.15 Hz ) high frequency ( HF= 0.15-0.40 Hz ) band expressed normalized unit ( n.u. ) . Moreover , ratio LF/HF also calculate . Spectral analysis estimate recommend use non-parametric method fast Fourier Transform Algorithms . Isolation Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells : In assay 5-6 mL peripheral blood collect EDTA tube . Under sterile condition , tibia femur cavity flush DMEM ( Dulbecco 's Modified Eagle 's medium , GIBCO , USA ) obtain bone marrow ( BM ) . PB BM fraction gradient density centrifugation ( 2.500 rpm , 25 min , 20-22°C ) ( Ficoll-Paque , GE , Germany ) , , mononuclear cell obtain sample address number quantification vitro function . Endothelial progenitor cell Immunophenotyping Quantification Flow Cytometer : mononuclear cell consider endothelial progenitor cell CD34+/VEGFR2+ cell . Briefly , 1x106 mononuclear cell individually incubate ( room temperature , dark , 30 min ) follow antibody : anti-CD34-PeCY7 plus VEGFR2-FITC isotype control anti-IgG-PE-Cy7 plus IgG-FITC . After incubation , cell wash PBS fix 1 % paraformaldehyde solution . Fixed cell keep ( 4°C , dark , 15-20 hour ) , analyze flow cytometer ( FACSCANTO , BD Biosciences , USA ) collect 1.000.000 event . Data analyze use BD FACSDIVA Software . Gates establish forward- side-scatter ( FSC/SSC ) plot correspond select mononuclear cell follow CD34-PeCY7 plus VEGFR2-FITC gate . Number EPCs ( CD34+/VEGFR2+ ) calculate percentage CMNs events30 . Endothelial progenitor cell - Functional Capacity vitro Assay : Mononuclear cell individually address colony form unit vitro . Briefly , 5x106 MNCs culture ( 37°C , 5 % CO2 , 95 % humidity ) 6-wells pre-coated fibronectin seed EndoCult medium . After 48 hour , 1x106 non-adherent cell transfer triplicate onto 24-wells pre-coated fibronectin culture 72-96 hour ( 37°C , 5 % CO2 , 95 % humidity ) EndoCult medium . Following , colony form unit count manually 2 blind observer invert microscope . Statistical Analysis : Statistical analysis conduct use SPSS version 21.0 Windows ( IBM Corporation , USA ) . Categorical variable compare use chi-square test . All continuous variable examine normality Shapiro-Wilk test . Since data nonparametric distribution use Wilcoxon test pair data order evaluate difference baseline post-Recreational physical activity program value . In addition , use Spearman 's rho correlation coefficient determine relationship irisin independent factor . The data express mean ± standard deviation . Statistical test two-tailed significance level set P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Children Both Gender Aged 6 14 year Clinical sign musculoskeletal orthopedic disorder prevent perform propose physical fitness test . Not complete anthropometric , metabolic physical fitness assessment postphysical activity period
